metadata.title: CVE-2021-41868 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: OnionShare 2.3 before 2.4 allows remote unauthenticated attackers to uploadfiles on a non-public node when using the --receive functionality.

criterions.comment: onionshare: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
